member.name: T:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.FeaturedMeasure
member.summary: Represents a bar that encodes the primary performance measure.
member.remarks: This Bar is normally functions like a bar on a bar graph. Based on the orientation of the scale, the bar runs from right to left or bottom to top. An exception is in dealing with negative data, where the orientation of the graph layout can be is reversed. Another exception is when the quantitative scale begins at a value greater than zero. In this case the featured measure is encoded as a small rectangle or some custom template.
